question: At which of the following places held was held the All India Khilafat Conference in 1919?
explanation: After the Jalianwala bagh incident, Gandhiji wrote in his “Young India” magazine that “This satanic government can not be mended, it must be ended”. Later he realized the Khilafat movement could unite Hindu and Muslim together. In the year 1919 (24th November), Gandhiji presided the All India Khilafat Conference in Delhi. The non-violence agenda was taken by the Khilafat Committee in June 1920.
